## (b)Statistical Summaries

```{r}
library(dslabs)

data("mtcars")

custom_summary <- function(x){
mea <- mean(x)
med <- median(x)
std <- sd(x)
mini <- min(x)
maxi <- max(x)
return(list(mea,med,std,mini,maxi))
}

cc <- c(5,3,4,9,2)
result <- custom_summary(cc)
print(result)

```

qq

```{r}
sumcol <- apply(mtcars,2,custom_summary)
print(sumcol)

for (i in seq_along(sumcol)) {
  cat("Summary for", names(sumcol)[i], ":\n")
  print(sumcol[[i]])
  cat("\n")
}
```
